meanings.definition: The fatty part of milk from which butter is made.
meanings.sent1: Butterfats are essential for making delicious butter.
meanings.sent2: The butterfats give butter its rich flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to lick the butterfats from the milk.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as smooth as butterfats melting in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The butterfats swirled in the churn, transforming into golden butter.

meanings.sent1: High-quality butter is known for its rich butterfats.
meanings.sent2: The butterfats determine the creaminess of the butter.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully juggled the butterfats in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His words were as comforting as warm butterfats on toast.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of butterfats filled the room, enticing everyone to the table.
